description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Data Integrator product of Oracle Fusion Middleware (component: Studio). The supported version that is affected is 12.2.1.3.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Data Integrator. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all Oracle Data Integrator accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).
